Item.Message: Guard: Ahh! Thank you so much.... brave knight!
You: *Blushing* ahem, it was no problem. Now you were going to tell me about yourself?

Guard: Yes, yes, okay, well, my name in May-Lyn. I'm from China, my father was enlisted in the war, and he's ill, so I took his place, and now im stuck here. I'm supposed to be a guard, but they don't know that I knocked out the last one, and took his place... They're going to kill me if they find out.
You: OH... well, I guess you'll just have to come with me then.
May-Lyn Thank you! I promise I'm a skilled warrior
